name: Pengo 2
overview: An unofficial sequel to the wildly popular Pengo game in it your first mission is at The North Pole. You arrive on the day of the annual Pengo-festival for lost penguins. Make your way through 5 maps of pure Pengo-action at the arcades to win yourself an exotic trip to Northern Sweden! Good luck!! In Pengo 2, you must defeat the enemy by pushing ice blocks together to crush them. You also can capture one if they are shocked and dizzy. There is also a time limit to make it a bit more difficult.
